predicate.note: Frames file for 'pacify' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 31.1, Framenet entry Experiencer obj.

roleset.name: make peaceful

example.name: passified?
example.text: The manuevering illustrates an emerging Republican donnybrook, pacified [*] since the early 1980s.

roleset.note: A 'donnybrook' is a brawl or brawler, named after the Irish town of Donnybrook which is apparently populated entirely by hotheads.
